|eth_ports = 8 |eth_speed = 1GbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = <!-- IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab --> |auto_mdix = supported |sup_jumbo = yes |sw_class = unmanaged

|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== "8ES1008G.2A1G", "ES-1008G", "REV-A1", and a date code of '''1205''' is silkscreened on one production model board. :Four radial '''TAICON''' branded caps (3x 25V, 470 microfarad, 1x 6.3V 470 microfarad) are used on this board. :There is a chip-size heatsink attached (presumably epoxied) to the RTL8370.
The ports in this unit are configured to use some sort of basic QoS (2 '''High''', 4 '''Mid''', 2 '''LAN/Low''').
===Used PSU(s)=== The power supply included with the unit seems to be an '''Asian Power Devices''' WA-08B05FU.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = Asian Power Devices |model = WA-08B05FU |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.3 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50-60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=5 |output_a=1.5 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |style=medium, vertical |countrymanuf = China |e_level=5 }}
